name: A lost fire
description:
This is the story of a lonely capsule. He/She is on a desert island, lost in the middle of nowhere.
Maybe you can help him/her survive. At least one day, against event the strongest forces in the sky.
And may he/she finds peace...


#### Instructions:
- Use W, A, S, D to move.
- Use E to grab items.

_/!\ QWERTY_

#### Made with :
- Dev : Unity
- Art : Blender
- Sound design and music : Ableton and my piano
